revised_title: Comparison of the Board of Trade Ampere-Standard Balance with the Ayrton-Jones Current-Weigher
tldr: The authors compare the Board of Trade ampere-standard balance with the Ayrton-Jones current-weigher and find that the currents measured by the Board of Trade balance are approximately 0.3% smaller than their values in terms of the Ayrton-Jones balance. The results confirm the accuracy and consistency of the instruments and support the principle of the balance.
